page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN S.NORMANTON
page.content: Employment in our area is changing a lot because the coal industry which was once the main employer is slowly dying and getting much smaller.Also new types of industry are coming into our area for five main reasons: {1.}The Growth Zone The Government has called our area a Growth Zone which means that grants and cheap rents are offered to new industry. {2.}The M1 Motorway This has bought easier transport to the area since it opened in 1968. {3.}Alfreton Railway Station A fast regular service bringing people from miles around. {4.}The A38 With the M1 Motorway this has improved transport. {5.}Many people in the area need jobs.
